# The `VersionTuple` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents a version number in the form major&#91;.minor&#91;.subminor&#91;.build&#93;&#93;&#93;. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VersionTuple</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents a version number in the form major&#91;.minor&#91;.subminor&#91;.build&#93;&#93;&#93;.

### withMajorReplaced() {#acb88b8d5103f0af97a7d734a5f440d53}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="VersionTuple llvm::VersionTuple::withMajorReplaced (unsigned NewMajor) const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
